鰼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰼； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1477第08
【唐韻】似入切【集韻】席入切，?音習。【說文】鰌也。【爾雅·釋魚】鰼，鰌。【註】今泥鰌。【疏】鰼，一名鰌。穴於泥中。又【山海經】囂水西流注于河，其中多鰼鰼之魚，其狀如鵲而十翼，鱗在羽端。其音如鵲，可以禦火。

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鰼; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1477 08
[Tang Yun] It seems to cut [Ji Yun] I cut into the seat, and learn the sound. [Said the text] Shi Ye. 【Erya·Shiyu】鰼,鰌. [Note] This mud 鰌. 【Sparse】鰼, a 鰌. Hole in the mud. Also [Shanhai Jing] The water flows westward into the river, among them, the fish with many scorpions, which looks like a magpie with ten wings, and its scales are on the feather ends. Its sound is like a magpie, which can protect against fire.
